value.name: Pilgrims’ Progress
value.description: But in William Brewster's day, it was rich in agriculture ... On the way, the local catchpole officers, as the police were known, "rifled and ransacked them, searching to their shirts for money ...

value.name: Lawsuit shines new light on old sex abuse scandal
value.description: The suit was filed Oct. 6 in U.S. District Court by William Brewster Brownville ... No criminal charges were ever filed. A 50-page police report filed in 1992 graphically detailed alleged abuse ...

value.name: The Joy Of Stupid Names
value.description: Venerable Mayflower pilgrim William Brewster ended up with children called Patience, Fear, Love and - best of all - Wrestling. In Agendum, we have free rein to name our reporters whatever we like ...
